title: Privacy Policy
intro: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how g4o2.me ("we", "our", or "us") collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our service.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.point1: Personal Information: When you sign up, we may collect your email, name, and other relevant details.
section1.point2: Usage Data: We collect anonymous data on how you use the app to improve functionality and experience.
section1.point3: Cookies and Tracking: We may use cookies or similar technologies for analytics and personalization.

section3.title: 3. Data Sharing
section3.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share it only with trusted service providers or when required by law.

section4.title: 4. Your Rights
section4.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your data. You may also withdraw consent at any time.

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.content: We take reasonable measures to protect your data, though no method of transmission is 100% secure.

section6.title: 6. Changes to This Policy
section6.content: We may update this policy. Significant changes will be communicated via email or in-app notice.

section7.title: 7. Contact
section7.content: If you have any questions or concerns, contact us at
